title: Google Photos Portrait Blur will be available for all Google One subscribers
content:
Google Photos on Android is one of the most popular apps that users make use of on a daily basis. It’s packed full of features, and on Google Pixel phones, has some pretty exclusive integrations. Now, one of those exclusive integrations is now being made available to Google One subscribers, and it’s improving too. Google

The post Google Photos Portrait Blur will be available for all Google One subscribers appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Google Photos Portrait Blur feature will soon be available for all Google One subscribers, after being a Pixel-only exclusive.
